src_original: Pratiṣṭhāpaṭalam (Chapter 3.6)  catasraḥ sarvākārāḥ pariśuddhayaḥ katamāḥ /  ālambanaśuddhiḥ /  cittaśuddhiḥ jñānaśuddhiśca /
savāsanānāṃ sarvakleśapakṣyāṇāṃ dauṣṭhulyānāmāśrayān niravaśeṣato 'tyantaparamaḥ sve cātmabhāve yathākāmādānasthānacyutivaśavartitā sarvākārā āśrayaśuddhistyucyate /
tgt_original: 謂依止靜慮，於隨所欲依止取住捨具足中若定若慧，及彼相應諸心心所。
